channel.title: Reading on Dragana Radanovic's website
channel.description: Recent content in Reading on Dragana Radanovic's website

item.title: How to discover new interesting graphic novels?
item.description: Last week you asked how I find interesting new comics to read. Hmm, I am a professional comic book reader, as I like to say. What does that mean? I read comics even if I find them unappealing at first sight, and also if by my personal taste they belong to the basket labelled “Naah”. But this wasn’t always like that. I think it all started when I was really young.
